lead_paragraph: The authorities billed it as a rescue, but Mexican soccer player Alan Pulido escaped his kidnappers by punching the one guarding him, snatching a cellphone and calling for help, a top official in the country's violent northeast said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Kidnapped Mexican Striker Pulido Escaped by Punching Captor: Official
headline.main: Kidnapped Mexican Striker Pulido Escaped by Punching Captor: Official

snippet: The authorities billed it as a rescue, but Mexican soccer player Alan Pulido escaped his kidnappers by punching the one guarding him, snatching a cellphone and calling for help, a top official in the country's violent northeast said on Monday....
